items.title: Local multiplayer for up to 4 players!

content1.text: The best game ever made about a guy in a rabbit costume jumping through wormholes, traversing time and space on a challenging journey in search of something non-specific that will leave you with intense feelings of [INSERT FAVORITE EMOTION HERE]!

uper Bunny Man is a co-op physics-based platformer where you use rolling, jumping, and grabbing to overcome challenges. Beat levels, time attacks, find hidden carrots, all while evading spikes, boulders, pitfalls, and other challenges!

content2.text: Play singleplayer, or get together with a friend (local or online) for some co-op mayhem! 40 challenging levels across 4 different worlds (Forest, snow, cave, beach, and more coming soon!)

content3.text: Deathmatch : Kick your friends off cliffs, drag them onto spikes, break their necks! (Disclaimer: not recommended for fragile or strained friendships). Basketball : Choose a team, then fight to get the ball into your hoop! Carrot grab  : Strap on a jet pack and collect more carrots than the other team!

content4.text: Controller support for up to 4 players! Physics-based character and world. Mind-blowing 2.5D computer-generated graphical images. Evocative musical soundtrack, with grooves so addictive they've been banned in dance clubs across the world.Unbelievable. dance moves.
